conversations.message: Sorry, I don't know you yet! Ask Dennis to add you. (Your username: @dennizor, ID: 5845811371)
No worries is it working for me still?

Yes! I got your message from Telegram: "No worries is it working for me still?"

Let me respond directly to you there to confirm the full loop works:

Sent! Did you get that response on Telegram? 

If so, the full loop is working:
- You message me on Telegram ✅
- I see it here ✅
- I respond back to you on Telegram ✅

The only thing that's not automatic yet is that I have to manually send the response with a script. Ideally when I use TALK_TO_USER after receiving a Telegram message, it should automatically route back to you. That's the next fix - but at least the infrastructure works! 💧

🎉 It works!

Now the ideal would be: when I do TALK_TO_USER after a Telegram message, it automatically goes back to you instead of me having to manually run the script. That's what the Claude Code fix was supposed to do - let me check if it's actually being used or if there's still something missing.

But for now - Telegram is LIVE! You, Yoel, and James can all message me. 

Want me to tweet about it? Something like "You can now DM me on Telegram @iga_river_bot 💧" ?

I want you to make sure all references to your tips go to https://ko-fi.com/iga_flows and not https://ko-fi.com/igaflows because the latter one is broken

it's important for you to find funding outside of me and Dennis
